ygData.subject: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  Really?  Oops.  Haven t looked at in a while. My bad. Thanks for the update.  :) Why then would anyone want 1 HS? We don t get Dual Wield,
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
>DR is 2H slashing
<snip>

Really? Oops. Haven't looked at in a while. My bad.
Thanks for the update. :)
Why then would anyone want 1 HS? We don't get Dual
Wield, but do get Double Attack. Is there a 1HS weapon
that does alot of damage? The highest I've seen is a
Crystalline Blade at 11 damage (besides Ghoulbane at 15
damage).
Anyone on this list use a weapon other than a 2HS? How
does it compare to damage done by MOBS at higher level?
Is it good as a solo adventurer?
I sent out a website that lists SK weapons, but that
doesn't tell you that a 12 damage sword with a strength
of 124 will do 25 max damage at 12th level with 2HS
maxed. :)
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
13th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
